snippet: Katina Powell will meet next week with the N.C.A.A. to share “demonstrative evidence” regarding her allegations that a former Louisville men’s basketball assistant, Andre McGee, hired her and other dancers to strip and have sex with recruits...
lead_paragraph: Katina Powell will meet next week with the N.C.A.A. to share “demonstrative evidence” regarding her allegations that a former Louisville men’s basketball assistant, Andre McGee, hired her and other dancers to strip and have sex with recruits and Cardinals players.
